title: Did Starbucks declare that "Patrons of Color " can go to the top of the line?
subtitle: One of the dodgers in the Starbucks race and anti-bias training showed a quote from the executive director of the series.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The CEO of Starbucks Kevin Johnson announced a new policy whereby "coloured potatoes will be allowed to move to the top of the line at all our locations."
